root_object.name: AS GSS DRM Migrate Vendor Data

process_model.name: AS GSS DRM Migrate Vendor Data
process_model.description: The process model to migrate individual vendor data along with all its related evaluation vendors

nodes.node_name: Update Ref and Eval Vendors Data

inputs.input_expression: = rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendors( returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_TOTAL_COUNT, executeWhen: true(), additionalFilters: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId, operator: "=", value: pv!refVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId] ) })

outputs.output_expression:
a!map(
  totalVendorCount: ac!totalVendorCount,
  iterationCount: 0,
  batchSize: cons!AS_GSS_DRM_INT_BULK_BATCH_SIZE
)

inputs.input_expression: = #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"( startIndex: product( pv!iterationInfo.iterationCount, pv!iterationInfo.batchSize ) + 1, batchSize: pv!iterationInfo.batchSize, sort: {})

outputs.output_expression:
rule!AS_GSS_DRM_BL_updateVendorDetailsFromGSM(
  refVendor: pv!refVendor,
  vendorsToUpdate: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendors(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_DATA_SUBSET,
    executeWhen: true(),
    fields: {
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.tin,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.fein,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluation.evaluationStatusId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessTypes
    },
    additionalFilters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
        operator: "=",
        value: pv!refVendor[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId]
      )
    },
    pagingInfo: ac!pagingInfo
  ).data
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord
expression_rules.description: Given a model record, updates the provided records' fields to match those of the model record.  Nulls apply if the field exists in the model record.

expression_rules.description: The rule is used to handle the business type data construction logic for ref vendors

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

record_types.name: AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Ref Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"(
        links: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
            label: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
            identifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Submitted Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.submittedDate,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.submittedDate],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Legal Name",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Business Name",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.businessName]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Address Line 1",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Address Line 2",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor City",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor State",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorState],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Country",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCountry],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Zip Code",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Zip Code Ext",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Foreign Postal Code",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Duns",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Cage Code",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Unique Entity Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Status",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Expiration Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Total Task",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalTaskCount,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.totalTaskCount],
      align: "START"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Completed Task",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.completedTaskCount,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.completedTaskCount],
      align: "START"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)

record_types.description: Synced record for evaluation vendor business types

record_types.name: AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: DEPRECATED IN GSS 2.5 - Synced record for Ref Vendor Business Types (Only used in vendor migration process)

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Business Ref Type Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: if(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId] < 100000,
              text(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId],
                "#00000"
              ),
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId]
            ),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD,
              identifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Ref Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId], ""),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Type Code",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
        "",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
        "",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]),
        "",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "check",
              altText: "Yes",
              color: "#138901"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "times",
              altText: "No",
              color: "SECONDARY"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      align: "CENTER"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)

record_types.name: AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: NOTE: Solicitation Description and Evaluation Description are 5000 characters and will be trimmed in the synced record

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Number",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"(
        links: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
            label: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
            identifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Title",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationTitle,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationTitle]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Description",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDescription,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDescription]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Solicitation Description",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.solicitationDescription,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.solicitationDescription]
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(

fields.display_name: Reconciliation And Migration Status For Federal
Reconciliation And Migration Status For SLG

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  emptyGridMessage: "No vendors available",
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_isActive(
        isActive: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      width: "ICON"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Name",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          rule!AS_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField(
            recordTitle: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
            recordIdentifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "UEI",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId,
      helpTooltip: "Unique Entity Identifier",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.uniqueEntityId]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "DUNS",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns,
      helpTooltip:
      "Data Universal Numbering System",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.duns]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "CAGE",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode,
      helpTooltip:
      "Commercial and Government Entity Code",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.cageCode]
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Status",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.status],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Business Type",
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_businessType(
        businessType: {},
        businessTypeRecord: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.refVendorBusinessTypes]
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Address",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1]
          ),
          "-",
          rule!AS_GAM_UT_displayAddressAsEnvelope(
            addressLine1: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
            addressLine2: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
            state: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.state.stateName],
            city: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorCity],
            zipCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCode],
            zipCodeExt: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
            foreignPostalCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
            country: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryName],
            countryId: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.country.countryId]
          )
        )
      ),
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Expiration Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.expirationDate],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    )
  },
  pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE,
  initialSorts: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_Vendor_SYNCEDRECORD.legalName,
      ascending: true
    )
  },
  spacing: "STANDARD",
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)

constants.name: AS_GSS_DRM_INT_BULK_BATCH_SIZE
constants.description: Value: 10 - Batch size for reading/writing line items in bulk, determined after thorough testing. Lower than this slows things down significantly. Higher than this provides minimal speed improvements while impacting CPU much more.
called_by: AS GSS DRM Migrate Vendor Data
